title: Sample Project from JSON
description: This is a sample project loaded from a JSON file to demonstrate the new import functionality.
pitch: A demonstration of the JSON import feature in the PPMS dashboard.
challenge: Creating a seamless way to import existing project data from JSON files.
development: Implemented file upload, validation, and preview functionality with a modern modal interface.
outcome: Successfully created a user-friendly way to import project data, reducing manual data entry time.

gallery.title: Main Project Image
gallery.description: The primary showcase image for the project

journey.title: Testing & Deployment
journey.description: Final testing and deployment to production
